name: stearoyl-CoA:methylmalonyl-CoA C-acyltransferase (mycolipanoate-forming)
definition: Stearoyl-CoA + 3 Methylmalonyl-CoA + 6 NADPH + 6 H+ + Acyl-carrier protein <=> C27-Mycolipanoyl-[acp] + 4 CoA + 3 CO2 + 6 NADP+ + 3 H2O
comment: Acy-carrier protein is acp domain of the enzyme itself [KO:K12432].
